bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis
Preferred Ratings and Related Required Capabilities for Voltages Above 1000 V
IEEE Standard for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis - Preferred Ratings and Related Required Capabilities for Voltages Above 1000 V

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The preferred ratings of indoor and outdoor high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 V for use in commercial, industrial, and utility installations are described.
The preferred ratings of indoor and outdoor high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 V for use in commercial, industrial, and utility installations are described.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: C37.06-2009, capacitance switching, dielectric withstand voltage, endurance, gas-insulated substations, high-voltage circuit breakers, interrupting capability, TRV
